99.comment: Has a script that is called on button press

253.comment:
A method finder that searches all loaded classes and methods for matches in the source.

Changes:
- added support for Traits

254.author: undefined
254.message: fixed Error when trying to update AttributeConnection(<lively.morphic.List#7ACC5... - searchResultList>.selection --> <lively.morphic.Box#AB402... - MethodFinderPane>.browse) with value [object Object]:

256.author: lauritz
256.message: adapted syntax highlighting of the searched pattern in the code pane, works now for regexp chars as '(', '['. '/', etc... (fixes #289 in trac)

262.author: undefined
262.message: added support for finding layers, and partial methods in layers

286.author: jenslincke
286.message: changed sort order to move direct hits up the list

292.author: jenslincke
292.message: resize corner to front; browse more methods...
